I'm not huge on sharing/extra men either, but it's about on par with ugly bastard. It gets bonus points if it's not there, but I don't really mind it unless it's excessively overdone. Like eldritch abomination level ugly bastards, or sharing a girl with so many dudes it becomes some kind of cum-filled pigsty in a warzone. That and I generally don't like the positions in gangbangs, one-on-one is hotter for me personally. In the end though, the dick is the final judge, if I can get off to it that's all that matters.

@Manthing I get what you mean but it's an NTR, traditional rules and mindsets don't apply. The NTR guys don't typically have any emotional attachment to the girl, and the women are nothing more than cocksleeves with a backstory. Original MC doesn't need to take responsibility for NTR'ing the girl because he doesn't have to. You don't need to take responsibility for buying a new game on Steam and have to 100% all achievements right? Same deal, this dude got burned out from his new 'game' and some other guy came in and started playing on his save file. Rude, but it's only as serious as that, not on the same level of having another man sleep with your girl (despite that technically being what happened).The girl is just a toy/pet to get his dick wet, a plot device and nothing more. Gotta detach yourself from your own rational/real-world perspective and biases when reading these, otherwise you're in for a bad time as you may have seen.
